name: WordPress ELEX WooCommerce Advanced Bulk Edit Products,Prices&Attributes SQL注入漏洞
product: ["WordPress ELEX WooCommerce Advanced Bulk Edit Products,Prices&Attributes <=1.4.9"]
description: WordPress ELEX WooCommerce Advanced Bulk Edit Products,Prices&Attributes是一款用于批量编辑WooCommerce产品信息、价格及属性的插件，支持简单、变体、外部和捆绑产品。WordPress ELEX WooCommerce Advanced Bulk Edit Products,Prices&Attributes存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于特殊元素中和不当，目前没有详细的漏洞细节提供。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://wordpress.org/plugins/elex-bulk-edit-products-prices-attributes-for-woocommerce-basic/
patch: WordPress ELEX WooCommerce Advanced Bulk Edit Products,Prices&Attributes SQL注入漏洞的补丁
